law.text: All of the territory in a county, or in two (2) or more counties contiguous to each other may be organized into a public library district for the purpose of levying a tax to pay for establishing, equipping, maintaining and administering libraries, or for contracting for library service from any existing library.
law.history: Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 114, sec. 2, effective June 16, 1960.
